channel.title: Apple on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Apple on My New Hugo Site

item.title: iWatch Concept
item.description:
If you could see the future, what would you watch?

Neat concept design by @frandiCosta

item.title: Original iChat UI
item.description: It's always exciting to see original prototypes of good products. Not to mention the sample conversation going on in there is rather delightful.

item.title: Apple sets the design standard
item.description: A pretty good article describing Apple’s success with their high attention to design.

item.title: Buy a mac
item.description: This article is so strange. It shows all the reasons why buying a PC with Windows Vista is a terrible idea, and yet the author seems perfectly happy with his Vista computer, even after paying absurd amounts of money to fix something that shouldn’t have broke in the first place.
